channel.title: U.S. Police Shooting News Tracker
channel.description: Automated news aggregation tracking police-involved shootings in the United States

item.title: After police shootings, Mamdani faces new pressure to overhaul NYC’s mental health crisis response
item.description: Two 911 calls for help ended with police at the door. Experts say dispatch rules and limited B-HEARD coverage leave few non-police options.

item.title: SWAT units shoot man barricaded in Lower Burrell home, accused of shooting at officers
item.description: Westmoreland County detectives are investigating an officer-involved shooting in Lower Burrell on Saturday.

item.title: Cops Fatally Shoot Man With Knife at Arc de Triomphe
item.description: A man wielding a knife and scissors was fatally shot by police in Paris on Friday when he tried to attack an officer during a ceremony at the city's Arc de Triomphe monument, officials said. The suspect, a French national born in 1978 who'd previously been co…

item.title: Feds Open Perjury Probe After ICE Officer Shot Venezuelan
item.description: Federal authorities have opened a criminal probe into whether two immigration officers lied under oath about a shooting in Minneapolis last month, as all charges were dropped against two Venezuelan men. Immigration and Customs Enforcement Director Todd Lyons …

item.title: Terror convict, recently released, shot dead by Paris police after alleged knife attack near Arc de Triomphe
item.description: Police shot a man who allegedly tried to attack an officer with a knife in Paris. The suspect was recently released from prison after serving a terrorism-related sentence.

item.title: Man shot dead after attacking police near Arc de Triomphe in Paris
item.description: A man who tried to attack a police ‌officer with a knife near the Arc de Triomphe in Paris on Friday ‌was shot by police and ⁠later died of his ⁠injuries, France's ⁠anti-terrorism prosecution office said. The police ‌officer was not harmed and no one ⁠else ⁠w…

item.title: A powerful tool of resistance is already in your hands
item.description: In an eyewitness video analyzed frame by frame by The New York Times, Alex Pretti raises one hand and holds a phone in the other. Federal agents tackle him, and one appears to find and remove a gun holstered on his hip. Then, an agent shoots - and a second fo…

item.title: Man Shot By ICE Has All Charges Dropped As Officers Face Federal Probe
item.description: Kristi Noem painted the Venezuelan man as an attempted murderer, but new evidence is "materially inconsistent" with the allegations.

item.title: Paris: Knife-wielding man shot by police at Arc de Triomphe
item.description: A man was shot and injured after attacking police during a ceremonial lighting of an eternal flame under the Paris landmark.

item.title: DOJ Drops Charges Against Two Minneapolis Men It Accused of Attacking ICE Agents
item.description: The federal government has shifted its view on the January 14 incident, when an agent shot one of the men.

item.description: Prosecutor Seeks Dismissal of Charges Against Man Shot by ICEThe New York Times Justice department moves to drop charges against men accused of hitting ICE officer in MinnesotaThe Guardian Government moves to dismiss charges against men in ICE-involved shooti…

item.title: Officer-involved shooting under investigation in Seattle’s Ballard neighborhood
item.description: Seattle police are investigating an officer-involved shooting in the Ballard neighborhood Thursday evening.

item.title: Lawyers of Chicago woman shot by federal agents say documents show how DHS lies about investigations
item.description: Marimar Martinez, a teaching assistant and U.S. citizen, was shot five times by a Border Patrol agent in October while in her vehicle. She was charged with a felony after Homeland Security officials accused her of trying to ram agents with her vehicle. But th…

item.title: ICE accuses Honduran alien of ramming law enforcement vehicle before agent shoots out tires
item.description: Dramatic video shows ICE agent drawing gun after Honduran illegal alien allegedly rammed a law enforcement vehicle during an arrest attempt in New Jersey.

item.title: 1 sent to hospital following officer-involved shooting in Hickory
item.description: Officers are on leave and a suspect is in the hospital after a shooting outside a church.

item.title: Police investigating officer-involved shooting at apartment in northeast Atlanta
item.description: The Atlanta Police Department is investigating an officer-involved shooting in northeast Atlanta.

item.title: Senior Russian officer shot in Moscow in apparent assassination attempt
item.description: An unidentified individual has shot Lieutenant General Alekseyev before fleeing the scene, authorities say.

item.title: Pulse-Pounding Body Cam Footage Shows the Moment NYPD Officer Shoots Knife-Wielding Man in Self-Defense – NYC Mayor Mamdani Meets with Perp and Demands He Face NO CHARGES (VIDEO)
item.description: Terrifying bodycam footage emerged this week showing the moment an NYPD officer shot a person in self-defense, prompting an outlandish reaction from New York City Mayor Zohran Mamdani. The post Pulse-Pounding Body Cam Footage Shows the Moment NYPD Officer Sho…
